channel.title: ::unipban command!

item.title: ::unipban command!
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

BIGEDIT: i got it to work i forgot to change the variable in the substring;. anyway now it takes the ip off the bannedips.txt but when i test it, it just says “somone is already logged in you’re account, please try again in 60 seconds”. =S

can somone help me? thx.

Btw heres the command i’m using:

else if(command.startsWith("unbanip") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("eric")) { File file = new File("./data/bannedips.txt"); if(file.exists()) { try { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file)); BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file)); String unbanip = command.substring(8); String inFile; while((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) { if(inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unbanip)) { // Leave this blank so it doesn't write. } else { out.write(inFile); } } } catch(IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } else { System.out.println("Error unbannedip"); } }

Read full topic
